entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: White Rock 10:00 AM PDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. 60 percent chance of wet flurries over higher terrain early this morning. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. High 9. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early this evening and before morning. 40 percent chance of wet flurries over higher terrain before morning. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 60%
